prompt: Build a simple task management app. I should be able to create, view, update, and delete tasks. Each task should have a title and a description. Keep the UI very basic.

intent.app_summary: A simple task management app that supports creating, viewing, updating, and deleting tasks, each with a title and description.

Task.description: A task with a title and optional description

assumptions: The application is intended for a single user and does not require authentication.
No advanced filtering or sorting features are needed; the UI will display a basic list of tasks and a simple form for CRUD operations.

change_summary: Created Task entity with title and description, added CRUD operations, set UI to form_and_list, and recorded basic user assumptions.

prompt: I want a small app to track things I need to do daily.

intent.app_summary: A minimal app to record and manage daily tasks.

Task.description: A task that represents an item to be completed on a given day

assumptions: The application is single‑user and runs locally.
Each task is intended for the current day; no explicit due date field is required.
No advanced filtering or sorting is required beyond basic list view.

change_summary: Created Task entity with minimal fields and CRUD operations.

prompt: Create an expense tracking app. Each expense should have an amount, category, date, and optional notes. I only need this for myself, no login or multi-user support.

intent.app_summary: A personal expense tracking app with basic CRUD functionality for expenses.

Expense.description: An expense record that includes an amount, category, date, and optional notes

assumptions: The application is intended for a single user with no authentication or multi‑user support
Data can be stored locally without a centralized backend

change_summary: Created an Expense entity with fields, CRUD operations, basic UI expectation, and noted single‑user assumptions. No login or multi‑user features are included.

prompt: Build a lightweight bug tracker for my personal projects. Each bug should have a title, severity, status, and description. I want to see all open bugs first.

intent.app_summary: A lightweight bug tracker for personal projects, listing bugs with their title, severity, status, and description, and showing open bugs first.

Bug.description: A bug with a title, severity, status, and description.

assumptions: Open bugs are shown before closed bugs in the UI.
The application is intended for single-user personal use.

change_summary: Added Bug entity with required fields, CRUD operations, form_and_list UI, assumptions for ordering and single-user context.

prompt: Build a notes app where I can create, edit, and delete notes. Each note should have a title and content.

intent.app_summary: Notes app for creating, editing, and deleting notes

Note.description: A note with a title and content

change_summary: Initial specification for a simple notes app
